title: Shift work for mothers associated with reduced fetal growth and longer pregnancies

title_detail.value: Shift work for mothers associated with reduced fetal growth and longer pregnancies

summary: Shift work exposure in mothers can result in reduced fetal growth and longer pregnancies, even when the shift work is only carried out early in pregnancy.

summary_detail.value: Shift work exposure in mothers can result in reduced fetal growth and longer pregnancies, even when the shift work is only carried out early in pregnancy.
